item.description:
Ristorante Marcellino specializes in dishes from the southern Italian region of Calabria. My family is from this region, so I thought it would be fun to share the experience of typical Calabrese eating.

Ristorante Marcellino is a "family owned and operated business is known for using "fine ingredients such as extra virgin olive oil, homemade pastas and sauces, and freshly made bread in their wood burning brick oven." The restaurant is located in downtown Waltham, and has lots of parking. There is also transportation on the commuter rail or by bus to reach the restaurant.

I've changed the reservation for a smaller group so that we can order off the menu. Here is a link to the menu: http://www.marcellino...
item.how_to_find_us: The reservation is in my name "Noelle"

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner and Music at Marcellino's Ristorante
